name: Leisure Hotel
description:
Welcome to the Leisure Hotel! This game was made for The PowerPoint Game Jam by PPTDEV. Follow the story of Max, a man who just got kicked out of his apartment looking for a place to stay. Luckily he finds a nice hotel that will do him just fine. Or so he thinks. Something sinister is going on in the depths of the hotel and Max is going to find out exactly what it is.

This game is a very short experience and there will be a chapter 2 coming very soon. But for now experience the beginning of the Leisure Hotel story.
